meanings.definition: 興味がある、関心がある
examples: Ich bin an diesem Thema interessiert. (I am interested in this topic.)
Er ist nicht an Politik interessiert. (He is not interested in politics.)

usage_notes: 'Interessiert' is the past participle of the verb 'interessieren' used as an adjective. It often requires the preposition 'an' (at/in) when referring to the object of interest.
